title: (x) Anyone know this script? / 'From Seam To Shining Sea' - Fenway Park {Minimalista}
content:
Does anyone know the typeface used on The Heads of State’s Shopify page?

[http://theheadsofstate.myshopify.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143722/http:/theheadsofstate.myshopify.com/ "http://theheadsofstate.myshopify.com")
author: timbre

comments.content:
I am sure Minimalista is right about Fenway but you might also have a look at Doyald Youngs' Home Run Script:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/script-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143722/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/script-roman/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/script-roman/")
